thread.title: Brussels mosque handover signals Saudi image rethink

title: Brussels mosque handover signals Saudi image rethink
text:
Brussels mosque handover signals Saudi image rethink 11:17am EST - 01:52 
Saudi Arabia has agreed to give up control of Belgium's largest mosque in a sign that it is trying to shed its reputation as a global exporter of an ultra-conservative brand of Islam. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Saudi Arabia has agreed to give up control of Belgium's largest mosque in a sign that it is trying to shed its reputation as a global exporter of an ultra-conservative brand of Islam.
